Columns

An upright field made of data cells, allowing data to align differently in a way to keep it distinct.

  • Home
  • Columns

An upright field made of data cells, allowing data to align differently in a way to keep it distinct. It helps to manage data in the form it does not get mixed. ChimpStudio theme comes with the short code to add up to four columns a given content area. Text, image or other short codes can be added in it.

1 Column Contents

Aenean at sapien metus, porta tempor velit

Customization Options / Features

  • Easy way to manage data.
  • Up to four columns in a given content area.
  • More convenient way to manage data.
